amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 8, 14, 25, 27, 28, 32, 33, 34, 35, 38, 40, 41, 42, and 45 printed in House Report 114-571. See page D538 of the Congressional Record of May 18, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 8, 14, 25, 27, 28, 32, 33, 34, 35, 38, 40, 41, 42, and 45 printed in House Report 114-571.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A024) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A024) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
